about.title: Kampung Kwau
about.description: Kampung Kwau, located in Mokwam District, Manokwari Regency, West Papua, is known as a conservation forest area with extraordinary biodiversity, especially endemic Papuan birds. In addition to being a natural habitat for various rare species, Kampung Kwau also has great potential as an attractive nature-based tourism destination for both local and foreign tourists. One of the main attractions of Kampung Kwau is its faunal diversity, especially endemic Papuan birds that can be observed through birdwatching activities. In addition, visitors can also enjoy the beauty of various butterflies. From the flora side, this village has unique natural wealth, such as the giant forest banana tree Musa ingens W. Simmonds, which is an endemic Papuan species, as well as various types of orchids that grow lushly and beautify the forest landscape. In addition to its natural beauty, Kampung Kwau also offers distinctive cultural charm. One of the interesting cultural attractions is the Tumbu Tanah Dance, a traditional dance that reflects the richness and local wisdom of the local community. The natural beauty is even more complete with the presence of waterfalls that add to the appeal for adventure and nature tourism enthusiasts. With its unique ecosystem and culture, Kampung Kwau is the perfect destination for anyone who wants to enjoy the natural beauty of West Papua while experiencing authentic local cultural wisdom.

tourPackage.title: Tour Package
tourPackage.heading: If You Visit Kampung Kwau, Several Tour Package Options Are Available

basic.name: Basic Package
basic.description: Basic tour package covering homestay accommodation, local food, and birdwatching activities with an experienced local guide.

standard.name: Standard Package
standard.description: Complete tour package with Arfak tribe cultural experience, nature exploration, and various other interesting activities.

premium.name: Premium Package
premium.description: Premium tour package with all the best facilities, exclusive experience, and professional private guide service.
